longBusinessSummary: Pearl Polymers Limited engages in manufacture and trading of PET bottles, jars, and containers to consumers and industries in India. It offers storage jars, water bottles, and gift sets servewares, as well as kitchen essentials, such as fridge organisers, food storage PP containers, and chopping boards. The company sells its products through retailers and online store under the Pearlpet brand name. Pearl Polymers Limited was incorporated in 1971 and is based in New Delhi, India.
